positions.title: Phd. student
positions.description: I obtained my Phd degree in theoretical mathematics (specifically Operator Algebra) based on my thesis with the title "Regularity of C*-algebras and central sequence algebras"

positions.title: Back-end developer
positions.description: Back-end developer in cross-functional team (business, back-end and front-end) in B2B part of Nuuday (TDC Erhverv). The focus area shifted, but revolved around mobile voice sales and management. First Java, then Kotlin. Towards the end a bit of front-end work in React SPA with both javascript and typescript

positions.title: Front-end developer
positions.description: Front-end developer in cross-functional team in B2C part of Nuuday (YouSee). Team focus area was a shop for TV susbcriptions and self-service. React (javascript) SPA with Redux in a hacked SiteCore setup
